Body.description: A string that defines the permissions for the policy. The syntax used is the Cedar Policy language.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the policy.

Body.description: A string that defines the permissions for the policy. The syntax used is the Cedar Policy language.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies a user.

Name.description: Human-readable label that describes a user.

CreatedByUser.description: The user that last updated the atlas resource policy.

CreatedDate.description: Date and time in UTC when the atlas resource policy was created.

Id.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal character string that identifies the atlas resource policy.

LastUpdatedByUser.description: The user that last updated the atlas resource policy.

LastUpdatedDate.description: Date and time in UTC when the atlas resource policy was last updated.

Name.description: Human-readable label that describes the atlas resource policy.

OrgId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies the organization that contains your projects. Use the [/orgs](#tag/Organizations/operation/listOrganizations) endpoint to retrieve all organizations to which the authenticated user has access.

Policies.description: List of policies that make up the atlas resource policy.

Version.description: A string that identifies the version of the atlas resource policy.

Profile.description: Profile used to provide credentials information, (a secret with the cfn/atlas/profile/{Profile}, is required), if not provided default is used
